item.title: python
item.description: python环境 问题 获取python2.x版本pip curl <https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py> -o get-pip.py python2 get-pip.py psycopg2包安装错误 yum install postgresql-devel pip2 install psycopg2 推送 #配置私有库 [distutils] index-servers = pypi nexus test [pypi] repository:https://pypi.python.org/pypi username:your_username password:your_password [nexus]
